src:
Kantor Imigrasi Depok Buka Tempat Pelayanan Baru di Mal Detos
07 Nov 2019, 12:14 by Sachril Agustin Berutu
Jakarta - Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Depok membuka tempat pelayanan baru untuk masyarakat yang ingin mengurus paspor. Tempat pelayanan ini baru saja diresmikan di sebuah mal di Depok.
"Untuk masyarakat yang ingin mengurus paspor, baik membuat atau pergantian, bisa datang ke Lantai 1 Depok Town Square (Detos)," kata Kepala Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Depok Agung Wibowo, usai acara peresmian Unit Layanan Paspor (ULP) Detos Town Square, di Mal Detos, Depok, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Agung mengatakan, ULP ini dibuka agar masyarakat Depok, tidak perlu jauh-jauh lagi datang ke kantor Keimigrasian Depok untuk mengurus paspor. Selain itu, ULP ini juga dibuka agar kinerja Imigrasi Depok semakin optimal.
"ULP ini juga dibuat agar konsentrasi kita (petugas) terbagi. Jadi tidak menumpuk semua dokumen pengurusan pemohon di kantor imigrasi. Adanya ULP ini, membuat kinerja kita semakin optimal," lanjut dia.


Kantor Imigrasi Kelas II Non TPI Depok buka ULP di Mal Detos (Foto: Sachril Agustin Berutu/detikcom)

Agung mengungkapkan, ULP ini buka setiap Senin sampai Jumat. Jam operasional dari pukul 08.00 WIB sampai 16.00 WIB.
Dalam kesempatan yang sama, Sekjen Kementerian Hukum dan HAM, Bambang Rantam mengatakan, kinerja petugas juga akan terpantau dari ULP ini. Masyarakat, dapat memberikan penilaian ke petugas ketika datang mengurus paspor.
"Ada aplikasi piawai IKM (Indeks Kepuasan Masyarakat), di mana kinerja petugas dapat terpantau sepenuhnya. Dari sini, masyarakat dapat memberikan penilaian kepada petugas yang melayani. Jadi dengan piawai IKM ini, diharapkan bisa memberikan pelayanan secara profesionalisme dan menjadi evaluasi untuk berkembang lebih baik," tutur Bambang.

(mae/mae)
text:
Depok Immigration Office Opens New Service Place at Detos Mall
Nov 7 2019, 12:14 by Sachril Agustin Berutu
Jakarta - Depok Immigration Class II Office Non TPI opens a new service place for people who want to take care of a passport. This service place was recently inaugurated at a mall in Depok.
"For people who want to take care of a passport, either making or changing, can come to the 1st Floor of Depok Town Square (Detos)," said Head of the Immigration Class II Non-TPI Depok, Agung Wibowo, after the inauguration ceremony of the Detos Town Square Passport Service Unit (ULP) , at Detos Mall, Depok, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Agung said, the ULP was opened so that the people of Depok did not need to go far to the Depok Immigration office to take care of their passports. In addition, the ULP was also opened so that Depok Immigration's performance was getting more optimal.
"This ULP is also made so that our concentration (officers) is divided. So it does not accumulate all documents for the application of the applicant in the immigration office. The existence of this ULP makes our performance more optimal," he continued.


Depok Immigration Class II Non TPI Office opens ULP at Detos Mall (Photo: Sachril Agustin Berutu / detikcom)

Agung said, ULP is open every Monday to Friday. Operating hours are from 08.00 WIB until 16.00 WIB.
On the same occasion, Secretary General of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Bambang Rantam said, the performance of officers will also be monitored from this ULP. Society, can provide an assessment to officers when it comes to taking care of a passport.
"There is an application of the IKM expert (Community Satisfaction Index), where the performance of officers can be fully monitored. From here, the community can provide an assessment to officers who serve. So with this IKM expert, it is expected to be able to provide services in a professional manner and be an evaluation to develop better , "said Bambang.

(mae / mae)
